titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Varian, Inc. Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by University Archives staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: This collection was given to Stanford University, Special Collections by Varian Associates and Varian, Inc., in 1999, with additions in 2005 and 2006.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research; materials must be request at least 48 hours in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Varian, Inc. Records (SC0889). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: For additional records from Varian Associates (1948-1988), please see Stanford University Archives collection SC0345, Russell and Sigurd Varian Papers.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Varian, Inc. (known as Varian Associates from its founding until 1999) was one of California's first Silicon Valley companies. It was founded by Russell Varian, Sigurd Varian, and Edward Ginzton in 1948.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Records include files on company history and anniversaries; press releases; photographs; annual reports and newsletters; manuals and other publications on products; and audio and video tapes.
